com.example.painintheass.UI

Class CombatUIManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.painintheass.UI.UIManager
      • com.example.painintheass.UI.CombatUIManager

  • public class CombatUIManager
extends UIManager
    Manages the UI of the combat activity.

      • updateMoney

        public boolean updateMoney()
        Update the player's team's funds. Adds income to total funds if INCOMEDELAY has passed since last increase.
        Returns:
        True if funds have been increase, false otherwise.
